name: Integration for Elementor forms – Sendinblue
author: Webtica

sections.description:
A lightweight but feature packed Sendinblue / Brevo integration for Elementor forms.
With this integration you can send your form data and contacts to Sendinblue / Brevo as easily as the standard integrations.
Keeping performance in mind this integration doesn’t add any additional scripts on page load.
Feel free to post any feature requests and possible issues.
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.0 or greater
  • PHP version 7.0 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0 or greater
  • Elementor Pro 3 or greater

We recommend your host supports:

  • PHP version 7.4 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.6 or greater
  • WordPress Memory limit of 64 MB or greater (128 MB or higher is preferred)

Installation

  1. Install using the WordPress built-in Plugin installer, or Extract the zip file and drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to Pages > Add New
  4. Press the ‘Edit with Elementor’ button.
  5. Drag and drop the form widget of Elementor Pro from the left panel onto the content area, and find the Sendinblue action in the “Actions after submit” dropdown.
  6. Fill your Sendinblue data and Key and you are all set. All users will be added after they submit the form.
sections.faq:
Why is Elementor Pro required?

Because this integration works with the Form Widget, which is a Elementor Pro unique feature not available in the free plugin.

Can I still use other integrations if I install this integration?

Yes, all the other form widget integrations will be available.

Does this also work with Brevo?

Yes, Sendinblue has changed it name and branding to Brevo. The integration will still work.

sections.reviews:
Finally, found this amazing plugin 😍

By zobairs on February 12, 2024

I was really tired up, trying and using all methods to integrate my Elementor forms to Brevo (old name SendinBlue). All others methods were having limitations or costs. Finally found this plugin. Big thanks to the developrs.

So, if you're looking for a way to connect your elementor form with Brevo, in such a way that someone fills the form and their data (name, email, etc.) automatically fetched in Brevo CRM, this plugin can do this magic. Do and use it.

Best plugin for elementor forms and best support!

By psiworks on November 16, 2022

This is the best plugin for integration of elementor forms with seninblue CRM. You can build the forms the way you want and this pluigin will deliver contacts and messages to sendinblue crm. Otherwise you will be limited to the layouts provided by sendinblue or other forms apps. Moreover, the support is just incredible! They are truly patient and won't let you go until everything is working perfectly. Great plugin and wonderful support!

Does a perfect job and is super easy to integrate

By blacckmamba on November 1, 2022

I've been annoyed the whole time that Elementor has no connection to Sendinblue. Then I tried MailOptin, which provides connections for different systems. But in principle it does far too much that I don't need at all. Then I stumbled across this plugin and also the bad rating. In Germany, it is important that the double opt-in procedure works. Without it, you don't even need to integrate such a system. And I thought it was only included in the paid version. But it is not! It is already included in the free version. Adjusting the DOI procedure is super easy to solve here. Perfect. In case anyone is wondering, Sendinblue requires you to use the normal DOI process (that is, the DOI link and the optin tag), not the marketing automation workflow. Thank you for such a useful plugin, which makes life easy and ensures that the signup forms can be beautiful too.

Easy and Lightweight

By Sven de Vries on April 13, 2022

Does what it's supposed to. The Pro version is a bit too expensive in my opinion.

Could've been a winner! But....

By etktech on April 12, 2022

Honestly, This could've been the best plugin available if you weren't mainly focused on money making and more focused on providing solutions for the community. €49/year to be able to map more attributes?! Seriously, MailOptin does it for free!!! Btw, double Opt-in is also included. Seriously, I'm a person who appreciates the efforts but charging people for something available to everyone by someone else for free is way beyond shocking. This is my opinion and I hope you take it as a positive criticism, if you would've provided the same free options as Mailoptin and charged for the other services. I am pretty sure that I'll be the 1st to get my card and buy your subscription and many users who understand the point of strength of your plugin which is "Lightweight" will probably agree and rush towards subscribing to your service. We understand paying for support and extra features and we back them up by subscribing to the more pro services, like I'd subscribe to get the "Dynamic list ID's - Send users to one or multiple lists based on checkboxes or dropdown" for example or "Enter all fields dynamically" or "Unlimited sites and activations" or/and even "Support". I would've given this plugin a 5 star rating blindfolded and even bought the subscription if it was focusing more on my needs. A successful business model is not only focused on generating income stream but more on building trust and exposure through the power of reputation. Make use of the concept of "word of mouth" believe me it's 10 times stronger than throwing marketing budgets and advertising on forums as answers to questions. And it'll generate ten fold the income stream you are hoping for. Good luck and I hope my words will help guide you through your future updates.

Best plugin to integrate with Sendinblue

By weselion on April 7, 2022

This is the best plugin to integrate with Sendinblue. It works perfectly fine and the support is top notch.

Perfect plugin

By dentyfritz on January 12, 2022

perfect integration of Sendinblue with this plugin. Moreover, the support is excellent and fast. Thanks Dieter

Awesome support and time saving plugin

By digitalcreed on November 24, 2021

I am very happy to have this plugin. It saves our efforts very much. Its perfectly and easily implemented into Elementor. Very good support and very fast. Thanks to Dieter!

Awesome plugin and support

By Gonzalo Suez (gsuez) on November 19, 2021

The plugin works perfectly, simple and easy to integrate with Sendinblue. The support, amazing, thank you Dieter!

Very fast support.

By wlengfelder on October 6, 2021

Had a question about the settings. Support answered very quickly. Integration Sendinblue and Elementor works very fast and easy.
